gamerule.cancelblockupdate:no_replace: Cancel Block Update: allow replace grass
gamerule.cancelblockupdate:off: Cancel Block Update: disable all effects of the mod
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.cancelblo: Cancel block updates, block schedule ticks, random ticks, place validation, fluid schedule ticks. Keep this mod on during world generation will generate lots of floating blocks. Switch this mod by game rule cancelblockupdate:off.
